title: c è¯­è¨€é‡Œé¢ #if ä¸å¯ä»¥è¿™æ ·ç”¨å—ï¼Ÿ

typedef enum {
    log_level_error = 0,
    log_level_warning = 1,
    log_level_info = 2,
    log_level_dbg = 3,
    log_level_all = 4,
} my_log_level;

#define SMALL 1
#define LARGE 4

static const int current_log_level = log_level_info;

int main()
{
#if (current_log_level > SMALL)
    int b;
#endif

#if (current_log_level > log_level_error)
    int b;
#endif
    b = 2;

    return 0;
}
